title: Ecological Wind Tunnels
description: Build multi-scale ecological models to support the development and rigorous testing of engineered organisms in artificial ecosystems that more closely mimic the complex spatial- temporal organisation and interactions of the real-world.

title: AI + Massively Parallel Assays
description: Show how massively parallel reporter assays (MPRAs) and sequencing-based surveillance, combined with rigorous metrology and advanced AI techniques, can enable the rapid development of genetic tools to reprogram diverse and environmentally important microbes such as cyanobacteria and track their dispersal in an ecosystem.

title: Improved Cyber-Bio Security
description: Improve the cyber-bio security of engineered cells to enable their traceability in natural environments and ensure trustworthy cell products that can be safely deployed into the wild.
